speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 1
speak_segments.original_text: गोपाल जी, आज आप हिस्ट्री क्लास में क्या पढ़ा रहे थे? आप कह रहे थे कि Tata Sky अब Tata Play हो गया है। यह कैसी हिस्ट्री क्लास है?
speak_segments.translated_text: Gopal ji, what were you teaching in the history class today? You were saying that Tata Sky has now become Tata Play. What kind of a history class is this?
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name="en-US-AriaNeural"><prosody rate="medium">Gopal ji,<break time="200ms"/> what were you teaching in the history class today? You were saying that Tata Sky has now become Tata Play.</prosody><break time="400ms"/><prosody pitch="high" rate="medium">What kind of a history class is this?</prosody></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 2
speak_segments.original_text: गीता जी, Tata Sky का Tata Play होना बहुत ही हिस्टोरिकल मोमेंट है। इसीलिए पढ़ा रहा था।
speak_segments.translated_text: Geeta ji, Tata Sky becoming Tata Play is a very historical moment. That's why I was teaching it.
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name="en-US-DavisNeural"><prosody rate="medium" pitch="medium">Geeta ji,<break time="300ms"/> Tata Sky becoming Tata Play is a very historical moment.</prosody><break time="400ms"/><prosody rate="medium">That's why I was teaching it.</prosody></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 1
speak_segments.original_text: अच्छा? तो और कौन-कौन से हिस्टोरिकल मोमेंट्स हैं?
speak_segments.translated_text: Oh really? So what are the other historical moments?
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name="en-US-AriaNeural"><prosody rate="medium" pitch="high">Oh really?</prosody><break time="200ms"/> So what are the other historical moments?</voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 2
speak_segments.original_text: वैसे कल आपका स्माइल करना मेरे लिए काफी हिस्टोरिकल था।
speak_segments.translated_text: By the way, you smiling yesterday was quite historical for me.
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name="en-US-DavisNeural"><prosody rate="slow" pitch="low">By the way,<break time="400ms"/> you smiling yesterday<break time="500ms"/> was quite historical for me.</prosody></voice></speak>

speak_segments.speaker: Speaker 3
speak_segments.original_text: अब Tata Sky है Tata Play. नाम बदल डाला क्योंकि एंटरटेनमेंट और भी जिंगालाला।
speak_segments.translated_text: Now Tata Sky is Tata Play. The name was changed because entertainment is even more Jinga lala.
speak_segments.ssml: <speak><voice name="en-US-GuyNeural"><prosody rate="fast" pitch="medium">Now Tata Sky is Tata Play.</prosody><break time="400ms"/><prosody rate="fast" pitch="high">The name was changed because entertainment is even more Jinga lala!</prosody></voice></speak>

metadata.notes: pitch, pauses, tone captured where possible; code-switch words preserved
